name: Fall Boy
description:
Game is adhering to theme of ON/OFF, so you have to turn off the middle ground to get to the bottom of the room, avoiding hazards. 
Controls:
A: Go right
D: Go left
S: controls the floor
The game is 10 levels long. I sadly couldn't make the deadline. Next year I hope I can compete. 

Sounds: the ones provided in the resources of the jam!
